files.patch:
@@ -790,4 +790,7 @@ - * {@linkplain InetAddressResolver resolver}. This is a best effort method, - * meaning it may not be able to return the fully qualified domain name; in - * which case it returns the - * {@linkplain #getHostAddress() textual representation} of the IP address. + * {@linkplain InetAddressResolver resolver}. + * + *

The system-wide resolver will be used to do a reverse name lookup of the IP address. + * The lookup may fail for reasons such as the host not being registered with the name + * service. In such cases, where the resolver isn't able to determine the fully qualified + * domain name, this method returns the {@linkplain #getHostAddress() textual representation} + * of the IP address.
